/* cetusUserLoginHist.userLoginHistList */ SELECT CULH.USER_UID ,TO_CHAR(CULH.LOGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') AS LOGIN_DT ,CULH.LOGIN_IP ,CULH.LOGIN_REGION ,CULH.LOGIN_BROWSER ,CULH.LOGIN_ACCESS_URL ,CULH.SESSION_ID FROM CETUS_USER_LOGIN_HIST CULH WHERE CULH.USER_UID = #{userUid} ORDER BY CULH.LOGIN_DT DESC
OFFSET ${startNumber} LIMIT ${endNumber}

/* cetusUserLoginHist.userLoginHistExcelList */ SELECT CU.USER_ID || ' (' || CU.USER_NM || ')' AS USER_INFO ,TO_CHAR(CULH.LOGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') AS LOGIN_DT ,CULH.LOGIN_IP ,CULH.LOGIN_REGION ,CULH.LOGIN_BROWSER ,CULH.LOGIN_ACCESS_URL ,CULH.SESSION_ID FROM CETUS_USER_LOGIN_HIST CULH LEFT JOIN CETUS_USER CU ON CU.UID = CULH.USER_UID WHERE CULH.USER_UID = #{userUid} ORDER BY CULH.LOGIN_DT DESC
OFFSET ${startNumber} LIMIT ${endNumber}
